original_text: “Now when forty years had passed, an angel appeared to him in the wilderness of Mount Sinai, in a flame of fire in a bush.
korean_text: 사십 년이 차매 천사가 시내 산 광야 가시나무 떨기 불꽃 가운데서 그에게 보이거늘

sentences.original_text: Now when forty years had passed,
in the wilderness of Mount Sinai,
in a flame of fire in a bush.
